page.title: 18LOCAL NEWS ITEMS IN TELFORD
page.content: The following items of local news appeared in the{SHROPSHIRE STAR}during the week{June19th-25th 1985}inclusive. Mrs Val Wood,who works at {CARREFOUR, {TELFORD TOWN CENTRE,}won the title {'Checkout Assistant of the Year'}on June24th in London.She won Â£1500. A{Dawley}man, who suffers from muscular distrophy, is having a very special 20th birthday treat. A life long{Rolls Royce}enthusiast, his dad has hired a{Rolls Royce Silver Shadow} to take him to{Rhyl.}It is costing him Â£100. Four credit card fraudsters were caught in{Telford Town Centre,}Wrekin magistrates heard,when a member of staff at a store became suspicious and checked the card.It has been stolen 2 days previously in{Luton}and bought for{Â£100}with the card holders signature previously removed.
